title: Crayon-Box
description: Crayon-Box was a collaborative project with some fellow student developers. We built an app that children can illustrate, write and share picture books. Project built with Lauren Rowley, Moriah Greenstein and Andy Beutler

title: Fantasy Football Draft App
description: This was a solo project which can conduct a live Fantasy football draft using the ESPN Player API. The purpose of this tool is to assist in a live draft conducted 'in-person' versus using the host-site's tool.

title: Helo
description: This assignment was required to be completed within 3 days. We were given screen shots of what the site should look like and a description of the functionality. All code originates from me.

title: Shelfie
description: Shelfie was also an assignment that was required to be completed within 3 days. As with Helo, the code is my work while DevMountain provided a walk-through and a description of the functionality

title: Ballparks Visited App
description: This is the first original project I created. We were asked to create a no database site of our choosing. This site is a simple blog that tracks visits to various MLB ballparks and rates their experience.
